articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Microsoft reportedly fires staff whose protest interrupted its Copilot event - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft has reportedly terminated employees who protested during the company's 50th anniversary and Copilot event.
articles.content: On Monday, Microsoft reportedly terminated the roles of two software engineers, Ibtihal Aboussad and Vaniya Agrawal, who protested the company’s reported dealings with the Israeli military during Mic… [+1054 chars]

articles.title: Hubble helps determine Uranus' rotation rate with unprecedented precision - ESA/Hubble
articles.description: An international team of astronomers using the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope have made new measurements of Uranus' interior rotation rate with a novel technique, achieving a level of accuracy 1000 times greater than previous estimates. By analysing more tha…
